content: of the heel flap there will be a note to finish the redistribution of the stitches �5 heel flap honeycomb * note that the slip_stitch for the flap must hang on the outside to show the honeycomb motif so the yarn will be held in back when you slip those stitches this is different than on the leg and instep beginning on ws with the last 28 32 36 stitches work heel flap back and forth as follows while keeping instep stitches - those with the pattern - on hold until it is time for the gusset row 1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end *note the first time only that you work this row one stitch will remain at the end do not work this stitch but rather slide it to the other needle with the stitches that remain on hold during the knitting of the heel flap it will become part of the instep stitches you should now have the required 28 32 36 stitches for the rest of the heel flap turn row 2 sl1 k to end turn row 3 sl1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 turn row 4 sl1 k to end turn repeat these 4 row 6 7 8 more times 7 8 9 times each for a total of 28 32 36 row alternate heel flap row 1 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 2 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end turn repeat these 2 row 13 15 17 more times 14 16 18 times each for a total of 28 32 36 row �6 heel turn with ws facing you turn the heel as follows set up row 1 ws sl1 p14 16 18 p2tog p1 turn set up row 2 rs sl1 k3 ssk k1 turn row 1 ws sl1 purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 1 & 2 until all stitches have been worked and 16 18 20 stitches remain gusset set-up using the needle holding the flap stitches pick up pu and knit the 14 16 18 slipped stitches for the first side of the flap pu one additional stitch in the space between the side of the flap and the instep remove bor marker work round 1 of the pattern as for the leg on the instep stitches using the other needle once again using the heel needle pu a stitch between the instep and the second side of the flap pu and knit the 14 16 18 slipped stitches on that side of the flap knit 8 9 10 stitches and place bor marker in its new position in the centre of the flap �7 *notice that on one needle will be all the flap and sides of the flap stitches which will become the underside of the foot and on the other needle will be the instep stitches now begin the
